Today, North Yorks is lighting up with 4 ft @ 8s NE swell and light 5 mph WSW winds. Withernsea and Filey are prime spots, both offering clean conditions, especially around their best tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop as fresh 21 mph NE winds blow through, making it poor across the board. Day after, we bounce back with similar 4 ft @ 8s ENE swell and calm 0 mph winds, perfect for a fun session at spots like Withernsea and Filey. Best: today.
